title: Bunting cake
description: This charming cake is decorated with beautiful bunting, easily made with straws and scraps of cute fabric.  Equipment and preparation: You will need two lengths of doweling rod, assorted ribbon and thread, and an electric mixer.
ingredients: 375g/13oz butter or margarine, softened at room temperature
few drops of blue food colouring
few drops of red food colouring
500g/1lb unsalted butter, softened and cut into squares
